description: React component for generating a draft SOW document based on provided project and company details, with simulated AI response.

methods.name: simulateGenerate
methods.description: Simulates generating a draft document by creating a formatted string with project details and updating the preview state.

ctags.name: GenerateDraft
ctags.pattern: /^export default function GenerateDraft({ company, project, template, onDraft }) {$/
